Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 43rd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2004...
Traded from Philadelphia to Pittsburgh on 2/16/2006 (Going to PHI: 1B G. Dobbs. Going to PIT: P G. Rath, SS I. Desmond)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Chicago (N) on 5/18/2006 (Going to CHN: LF J. Edmonds, P D. Willis, SS I. Desmond. Going to PIT: P J. Juden, CF J. Guillen)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Milwaukee on 7/2/2007 (Going to MIL: P J. Fogg, SS I. Desmond, 3B C. Koskie. Going to CHN: P D. Lowe)...
Traded from Milwaukee to Tampa Bay on 7/13/2007 (Going to TB: P W. Ogburn, SS I. Desmond. Going to MIL: 3B A. Beltre)...
Injured on 8/11/2010 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/10/2011, off Freddy A. Garcia (NYA)...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/3/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/3/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (A) on 4/23/2021 (Going to HOU: 3B K. Russo. Going to CHA: DH I. Desmond)...
Injured on 4/10/2022 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
